ccm:application.name: ccm-sci-publicpersonalprofile
ccm:application.ccm:description: Aggreates informations about a SciMember item. In the content center it provides a form for editing the contact associates with the SciMember item. Also a form is provided to link articles or other content items with a person. The view is provided by an special content panel for SciMember which has to be added to the template of the SciMember content type (an example JSP is provided with this module).
